text: When I notice financial anxiety rising, I recognize it and choose to understand the cause and plan ahead instead.
During moments when money feels uncertain, I notice it and choose to stay calm and think strategically instead.
When I feel the pull to let fear control financial decisions, I notice it and choose to stay calm and plan instead.
I let not being able to understand financial anxiety prevent me from staying calm and planning ahead effectively.
